title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, November 9, 2021
description: Poet Anne Sexton was born on this day in 1928. “The beautiful feeling after writing a poem is on the whole better even than after sex, and that’s saying a lot.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Poet Anne Sexton was born on this day in 1928. “The beautiful feeling after writing a poem is on the whole better even than after sex, and that’s saying a lot.”
